name: PPPixel
description:
A small game for the 20 Second Game Jam. The objective is to copy all of the pixels in whatever order you want, without making any mistake. We've sort of calculated the amount of pixels needed to make it a challenge, while making it not impossible (we won like 3 out of 10 rounds in average).

And yes, this game is also a shameless promotion for our awesome snake game: Sassy Snake!

Instructions: Just unzip and open PPPixel.exe. Your antivirus may complain, in such case you only need to whitelist the exe.
